original_title: Captain Bill's Fun, Fun, Funship of Madness, Mayhem, and Music
overview: On Valentine's Day 1962, the kids aboard the Funship learn important life lessons.
tagline: CAPTAIN BILL'S FUN, FUN, FUNSHIP OF MADNESS, MAYHEM AND MUSIC is an irreverent and twisted PARODY of local TV kids' shows from the 1950's and 1960's.
title: Captain Bill's Fun, Fun, Funship of Madness, Mayhem, and Music
